_sText:
mg_theship     By : PORSCHE.AE


Description : An adventure map . The CT'S must ride the ship and complete the levels until they reach the end of thr map . T's must Impede CT'S in each level .

NEW IN BETA3 : 

- add new soundtrack 

- add new ending 

- fix "some" bugs 

Problems : sometimes NOBLOCK mod effects the ship and kill all CT'S . this Problem happens in some servers .


This is the third beta of this map. So I need your Feedback to improve the map :) .


Have fun !
